channel.title: Help with run.bat

item.title: Help with run.bat
item.dc:creator: @baseball4355 baseball4355
item.description:
@baseball4355 wrote:

hello everyone, im running on vista and i download pk planet and i got the compiler to work, but when i click on run.bat it says “Windows cannot find ‘java’. Make sure you typed the name correctly, then try again.” I dont know why its not working. The run.bat code (When I press Edit) is this…

@echo off
title Pk Planet
Start java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

can someone help me? I have already port forwarded and everything! All I need is this part!

Read full topic
